description: The Midlands Regional Hospital in Mullingar says the move is to protect new mothers and babies.
title: Coronavirus: Irish hospital bans fathers and partners from births
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish hospital bans fathers and partners from births - BBC News
maintext: The Coombe Women's and Infants University Hospital in Dublin will only allow visits by nominated partners of pregnant women and parents of babies in the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit.
